tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_service_interactions (
	interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	agent_id INT,
	customer_id INT,
	interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
	interaction_duration INT,
	satisfaction_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerInteractions (
    interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    interaction_date DATE,
    interaction_time TIME,
    interaction_duration INTERVAL,
    call_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE AgentPerformance (
    agent_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    total_interactions INT,
    total_duration INTERVAL,
    average_duration INTERVAL,
    satisfaction_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    interaction_date DATE,
    interaction_time TIME,
    interaction_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE agents (
    agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_name VARCHAR(50),
    agent_team VARCHAR(50),
    agent_role VARCHAR(50),
    agent_experience INT
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    customer_email VARCHAR(50),
    customer_phone VARCHAR(20),
    customer_location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerInteractions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_duration INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE AgentPerformance (
    agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_name VARCHAR(50),
    performance_score DECIMAL(5,2),
    interactions_completed INT,
    training_completed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    interaction_id INT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP,
    feedback_rating INT,
    feedback_comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE TrainingPrograms (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(50),
    program_description TEXT,
    program_duration INT,
    program_trainer VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    interaction_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE agent_performance (
    agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    average_response_time FLOAT,
    total_interactions INT,
    feedback_rating INT,
    training_completed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    interaction_id INT,
    agent_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE training_programs (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(255),
    program_type VARCHAR(50),
    completion_rate FLOAT,
    duration_days INT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_records (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    email_address VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address TEXT
);
